semaphore-ci.organisations.markdownDescription: The list of organisations your Semaphore CI account has access to. To find this, open [me.semaphoreci.com](https://me.semaphoreci.com). The organisations will be shown in the URLs. For example, if you have an organisation `foo.semaphoreci.com`, the organisation name will be `foo`.

semaphore-ci.autorefreshDelay.markdownDescription: Controls the time between the automatic refreshes in milliseconds. Set to 0 to disable.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Get started with Semaphore CI by configuring your API key and connected organisations.
Your API key can be found at [https://me.semaphoreci.com/account](https://me.semaphoreci.com/account).
[Set API Key](command:semaphore-ci.setApiKey)
See the settings for instructions on finding the organisations:
[Open settings](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%5B%22semaphoreci%22%5D)
Once the API Key and organisations are set, you can press the Refresh key at the top to refresh the view.

The API key is set, but requests to semaphore return a HTTP/401 error, implying that the API key is either incorrect or does not have access to one or more of the configured organisations. Please do the following:
Reconfigure the API key:
[Reconfigure API Key](command:semaphore-ci.setApiKey)
Verify that all organisations in your settings are organisations that you have access to with the given API key:
[Examine organisation settings](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%5B%22semaphoreci%22%5D)
